About Me

Get to know more about me...

BIO

Tamida Rabuwa is a dynamic Web and Mobile Developer with a fervent interest in both software technology and AI essentials. With a solid foundation in web technologies and AI essentials gained through rigorous training and certification programs with Andela, IBM, Udacity, Kad ICT, and the esteemed 'Click On-kaduna' initiative in partnership with the World Bank, Tamida brings a unique blend of technical prowess and strategic thinking to the table. Equipped with expertise in Wordpress, Angular Framework, Version Control (GitHub), Ionic Framework, Laravel Framework, PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, MySQL, Rest API, Figma, and AI essentials by ALX, Tamida stands out as a versatile problem solver capable of tackling complex challenges with innovation and efficiency. With a deep understanding of Wordpress, Tamida excels in crafting intuitive and visually appealing websites that drive user engagement and achieve business objectives. Tamida's dedication to mastering emerging technologies, coupled with their proficiency in design thinking, communication skills, and teamwork, positions them as a valuable asset in any development environment. Their ability to navigate competing priorities while delivering high-quality results underscores their reliability and adaptability. Driven by a passion for continuous learning and a commitment to excellence, Tamida is poised to make a meaningful impact in the tech industry. With a forward-thinking approach and a collaborative mindset, Tamida is eager to contribute their skills and expertise to drive positive change and innovation in the ever-evolving world of technology.

Hard-Skills

Web Developer

WordPress, ChatGPT, Gemini, Microst Copilot, Prompt Egnineering Angular, Ionic, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, MySQL, Laravel, Version Control(Git/GitHub), Responsive Web Design, Testing/Debugging, Web UI/UX Design, SEO, Cross-Browser Compatibility.

Soft-Skills

Web Developer

Design Thinking, Written & Verbal Communication Skills, Teamwork, Adaptability, Problem Solving, Critical Observation, Time Management, Detail-Oriented, Strong Organization Skills.
